courses.title: Introduction to Computer Science
courses.description: An introductory course covering the fundamental concepts of computer science. Topics include algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: In-depth study of data structures and algorithms. Emphasis on algorithm analysis, sorting, searching, and data manipulation.

courses.title: Database Management Systems
courses.description: Introduction to database systems, relational databases, SQL, and database design principles.

courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: Principles and practices of software engineering. Covers software development life cycle, project management, and software testing.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning, and natural language processing.

courses.title: Computer Networks
courses.description: Study of computer networks, protocols, and communication technologies. Includes network design and security.

courses.title: Operating Systems
courses.description: Principles and design of operating systems. Covers process management, memory management, and file systems.

courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: Introduction to web development technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side scripting.

courses.title: Cybersecurity
courses.description: Fundamentals of cybersecurity, cryptography, and network security. Focus on protecting information systems.
